import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { }) return ( <>

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
